about_the_game:
Get ready to meet the most terrifying effects set! Create horror movies that will really give your viewers the creeps.

This set includes:
  • Horror Circus Pack
  • Horror Intro Pack
  • Horror Pack
  • Zombie Veggies Pack

In this set, you’ll find:

  • 10 titles
  • 38 stickers
  • 10 backgrounds
  • 8 transitions
  • 6 intros
  • 3 frames

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Suite 2022 Steam Edition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10/11 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 × 768 screen resolution, 32-bit color
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
